title: An Album of sunny memories: for Delcie
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Mothers and daughters
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children - Family relationships
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family - Australia
abstract: A tribute by a daughter in celebration of her mother turning 80.
description: Dale Williamson provides rich detail of the life of her mother Delcie. From Victory Girl in her beloved Cygnet in Tasmania to wife and mother of four children, Delcie has led a life of simple joys and familial love.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006941; Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (Nov/Dec 2005); Active; 2005
